posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale a 1910 T206 Doc Adkins (Balt) card.  This is a T206 card that is more scarce than most of the T206 commons.

The front has a nice picture, with honest wear on the corners. The back has a some paper loss. But overall, this is a decent Doc Adkins card.

 Take a look for yourself.

The price is lowered to $65.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/06-005.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-005t.jpg[/IMG]

Click on the picture to look at a larger scan of the front and back.[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back. 
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board. 
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
I know it's a long shot but I was wondering if this t206 Adkins is still available.  If it's available, would you be willing to negotiate?
